TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CompositeCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList, class System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged, class System.ComponentModel.ICollectionViewFactory, class System.Windows.IWeakEventListener

Docs.summary: Enables multiple collections and items to be displayed as a single list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CompositeCollection can contain items such as strings, objects, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes, elements, as well as other collections. An <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> uses the data in the CompositeCollection to generate its content according to its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.ItemTemplate%2A>. For more information about using <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> objects to bind to collections, see the Binding to Collections section of the [Data Binding Overview](../Topic/Data%20Binding%20Overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Data.CollectionContainer> object counts as 1 item.

Docs.param: The index to insert the item at.
The item reference to add to the collection.
Docs.summary: Inserts an item in the collection at a given index. All items after the given position are moved down by one.
Docs.exception: If index is out of range.

Docs.value: The item at the specified zero-based offset.
Docs.exception: If the index is out of range.
